text: sasvatavada totagalu avarigagi kadive. Avugala taladalli nadigalu hariyuttiruvavu. Alli avarige bangarada kadagagalannu todisalaguvudu mattu avaru resme hagu jaratariya hasiru udugegalannu dharisi alliruva dimbugala mele oragikondiruvaru. Adu bahala sresthavada pratiphala mattu atyuttama visrantidhamavagiruvudu
